example.eg: You can do it however you want to. Just do it!
example.egtrans: 你可以用任何方式来做这件事，去做吧！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论如何, 不管怎样

example.eg: He always looks good, however he dresses.
example.egtrans: 不管他如何穿着，看起来都很精神。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不管以何种方式，不论如何

example.eg: We can accept no mistakes, however small.
example.egtrans: 我们不接受任何错误，不管多小都不行。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不管到什么程度, 不管多么

example.eg: It was very expensive travelling to visit my sister and her family; however, it was completely worth it.
example.egtrans: 前去拜访我姐妹及其家人的开支很大，但这都是值得的。

example.eg: It's a good idea. However, I don't think we have the money to fund it.
example.egtrans: 这是个好主意。不过，我认为我们没有钱为之提供资金。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 怎样，怎么, 如何, 以…方式
